Rocky and Cassie took their tinies out of their room; down the hall; past the living room where some tinies met their end; past the kitchen where Ormand was humming Under The Sea, while cooking what could be assumed was seafood; and finally to their exercise room at the end of the hall. "Let's get started!"

Rocky set the tiny on the weight bench, and got on to lift weights.
The furry on the bench cried out as Rocky's balls came down on him each time.
"Hey! Save the complaining for when I really work up a sweat!" Sure enough, the effort Rocky was putting in started making his balls sweat.
Sure enough, the cries turned to shrieks of despair as the balls kept coming down! The sweat matting the furry with stinky moisture and invading the furry's nostrils through the thin fabric.
After a while, Rocky sat up, with his balls on the furry. "YEAH! Smell that? Those are the balls of a REAL MAN!" He repeated this for another 3 hours, taunting the little one with his musk.

Cassie set her furry on the conveyor belt of the treadmill. Set the speed at 9, and started running.
The furry looked up, and, as if in slow motion, Cassie's bare paw stomped him. In fact the smelly foot came down again and again on him that it, if not for the constantly renewed pain, the furry could've sworn the foot was standing still.
After an hour and a half, she took a break. Panting furiously, she took a long drink of water from her water bottle. When she got her breath she said to the furry, "in a minute, I will do another hour and a half!"
The furry waved his hands in front of him. He barely survived the first half!
"Aw, but I have to! Got to look good for my man! If you thought the first half was bad, wait till the claws come out!!
The furry looked and saw with horror, the claws extending from her toes. He didn't last long after that... well, his body did, but his life went away quickly. His body remained impaled upon one of her nails.

"Well", Cassie said, "are you done? I believe Ormand made lunch! I can smell something ocean-like, and I'm famished!"

"Lead the way, Love!"
113111.title: exercises all POV's

1132.content:
The alarm clock rings at 7:00 A.M. and both Rocky and Cassie roll out of bed, not looking forward to another day of the daily grind.

"I HATE going to that shitty place just to pay the bills!" Rocky complains.

Cassie comes right in front of him to help put on his tie. "Just think about your future with me! And hey, if you need to let off some steam, you can always shrink some lower level employee that won't be missed!"

"Mmm, yeah! I forgot about that! What a feeling it is to have absolute control over someone's life! Thanks honey!" Rocky crosses to the bedroom door, to open it. He is startled when he sees Ormand standing there.

"Mon dieux! Bonjour!"

"Ormand! What are you doing here? Where did you dissappear to last night? You know what, it'll have to wait until tonight, we both have to go to work."

Rocky and Cassie left for work.
"See you tonight, baby!" Rocky gave Cassie a full on kiss.

Who's work day would you like to focus on?
1132.title: Off to work again tomorrow

11322.content:
Only having one car between the two of them, Cassie had no problem taking the bus to work, and letting Rocky drive. She enjoyed the walks to the bus stop; the wind on her face was nice! She also enjoyed scoping out potential victims, whom she could shrink and take home to share with her new soon-to-be husband, eating them herself at lunchtime, or torturing them.

At a newsstand, Cassie stopped to "browse the articles" in the paper. When a customer left with a newspaper, Cassie followed him. She had chosen her next victim.

"Excuse me, sir, how would you like a tour in my hydrochloric station?" Cassie was lucky, because she could just ask for people to do things, and, because of her beauty, they would agree. Only she could make "my hydrochloric station" sound so appealing! Because, of course, Cassie just asked if he wanted to go down into her stomach and visit her stomach acid! But she preyed on the weak minded. That's how she gets them!

It also helped if they were stupid, like this one, and they don't know what she means. This individual probably thought she was asking for sex. His heartbeat quickened. "O... Okay!"

As he was following Cassie into an alleyway, he asked, "so, where do you want to do it?"

The only question was whether Cassie would break his bubble now or later. Thankfully, it was decided for her as she checked her watch. Only ten minutes before work started; not enough time to tell him all she wants to. "Sorry, hun!" She took out shrink gun, and fired it at him. He slowly shrank to five inches tall. Cassie picked him up, and put him in her purse.

She had to hurry to the bus stop! She ran down the street,; hard to do in high heels, and arrived at the stop just in time.
11322.title: Cassie

113221.content:
Cassie received strange looks from the people on the bus, who heard noises from her purse. She knew that the best way for her to handle this situation would be to continue as if nothing was different. And if she was asked, well, she was sure she could think of uses for them! No one asked, but the looks of inquiry continued.

5 stops later, Cassie was at work. Running up to the front door, and able to slow her pace once in, she took the elevator to her floor. Somebody was in the elevator, one of her bosses, Mr. Leoture and he looked as if he was about to ask her a question. Cassie prepared for the worst!

"I have a complaint!"

"You do? But I arrived on time!"

"No, no, it's your high heels!"

Cassie breathed a sigh of relief. "What about them?"

"What do you have in the heels? Speakers? They're so loud!"

Cassie knew this was one of her bosses, so she couldn't laugh, but she permitted herself a smile. When she realized Mr. Leoture had no personal interest in smiling at his ridiculous criticism, she quickly stopped smiling.

"... Anyway, I wanted your quarterly fiscal report last Monday! Today's Thursday! If you don't have it in to me by the time I go home tomorrow, you're FIRED!"

Cassie's eyes narrowed. Would anyone really notice Mr. Leoture's absence? She didn't know much about his personal life, but she knew that at work, everyone hated him! Hmm...

But she would get to finishing her fiscal report, not for Mr. Leoture, but for the managing partners! She had only seen them once, but she got a nicer vibe from them.

Exiting the elevator, she went to her office; the second last door on the side facing the out. She had a window office! That was nice!

Turning on her computer, she opened the fiscal report...

And so the hours passed until lunch hour. Cassie remembered the idiot she shrank this morning. Should she eat him with her lunch, or wait until tonight so Rocky can help her make a decision?
.
113221.title: Cassie (continued)

1132212.content:
Cassie made up her mind. She dumped out her purse on her desk.

The person she shrunk earlier today tumbled out onto her desk, along with her lipstick and eyeliner. His vision was shaken up pretty bad. When he focused, he was shocked to see a giant dog face looking down at him! He backed up on her desk slowly.

Cassie might as well scare the guy a bit! She picked up the frightened man, brought him to her face, and said "well, it's lunch time!"

The person squirmed a lot when he heard this, trying to get free of her grasp.

Cassie just LOVED scaring her victims! "I decided not to eat you! You'll come home with me!"

The man relaxed a bit, and said a big "thank you! I wanted to come with you! THANK YOU, THANK YOU!

Cassie smirked. "Men!" she thought in exasperation, "one track minds!"
She said "I wouldn't be too excited there, hun! Once my fiance helps me figure out what to do with you, you're a goner! So I wouldn't grovel just yet! Actually..." She put the man on the floor at her feet.
(http://download.lavadomefive.com/members...)
"Since I can't have you running around while I buy lunch, you'll have to go in my shoe!
1132212.title: Wait until tonight

choices: I'll tie him into your foot fur (reserved)
11322121.content:
Cassie enjoyed the feeling of having people in her heels, so much so in fact that she nearly had an orgasm every time she felt a squirming body under her feet. She got up, and walked to the elevator.

"CASSIE! FOR GOD SAKE, SHUT YOUR HEELS UP!!" It was Mr. Leoture. "TOMORROW, CASSIE! I BETTER HAVE YOUR REPORTS, OR SO HELP ME GOD, YOUR SORRY ASS WILL BE OUT ON THE STREET!!!"

Cassie had enough of this guy! Getting yelled at in front of all her co-workers crossed the line!

Mr. Leoture got on the elevator too, probably to yell at Cassie some more. As soon as the doors closed, Cassie whipped around,and shrunk him.

"You know, Mr. Leoture, you are an asshole! YOU HATE MY SHOES SO MUCH, WELL LET'S SEE HOW YOU FIND THEM ON THE INSIDE!!" Cassie brought him up to her face, and said "BE THANKFUL I'M NOT TEARING YOU TO SHREDS!!" She brought him back down.

Seeing her razor sharp canines up close was enough to scare the poor guy out of his mind.

After placing him in her other heel, she stood up again. The elevator door opened onto the main floor, and Cassie walked out like nothing happened.

After getting her lunch - ham and Swiss on rye - and going back up to her office, she began crunching numbers for the report. True, she had shrunk the person who had demanded it, but she had other bosses who wanted it, but were too polite to demand for it! It took her the afternoon, but she completed her report.

She printed it, and then took it upstairs to her boss, Mr. Honeywell. "Here you are sir!"

"Well! Well, well, well! You got it in! Well done! In fact, I'm promoting you!" Mr. Honeywell had little pinpricks for eyes, and so he lit up the room whenever he was pleased, making him a favorite among the employees.

"I apologize for it arriving so close before it's due!"

Mr. Honeywell looked up suspiciously, "Who told you that?"

"Mr. Leoture, sir!"

"That cretin! The firm's been trying to get rid of him for months! By the way, where is he?"

Cassie was suddenly aware of the renewed struggling beneath her feet! She smiled inwardly. "He went home sick with the flu!"

"Hope he succumbs to it!" Mr. Honeywell whispered. "Well, I suppose these things happen! Thank you, you're free to go home now! In fact, as far as I'm concerned, you did enough work to warrant taking the rest of the week off! Well done!"

"Thank you, sir!" Cassie turned and walked to the elevator. Did that just happen!! A promotion, AND granted the rest of the week off? Add to that the fact that she had two people kissing her feet! Yeah, today was a good day!"'

After exiting the building, she walked to the bus stop.

The bus ride was uneventful. That's all right, she had an exciting day, and she'll have an exciting night!!

She got off the bus, and up to the penthouse she shared with Rocky.

"Hi honey!"

"Hey baby!" Rocky turned Cassie around and gave her a kiss. "How was your day?"

"AMAZING!! I got promoted, AND I got the rest of the week off! And I brought home some people we can dispose of!" She took off her heels, and let the two people fall out onto the floor! "Now, this one is one of my bosses, and he was a jerk to me! I want you to help me think of a special punishment for him!! The other is some stranger I shrunk this morning. Did you shrink anybody?"

Rocky spread his hands "I didn't have the shrink gun. I did see some potential victims, though! We'll be busy tonight anyway. Now about your boss, what area were you thinking?"

"Something that will last! I want him to suffer!"

"Okay. Do you want to have the honors of causing him misery?"

"Honestly, I want to do it!"

"Okay. I think I have something wicked!"

You are a 15 year old male named Ben. You have brown hair, grey eyes and pale skin. You stand at a short 5"0 and are quite weak. You were always teased for being so small, but you had no control over it. You had your small group of friends, but you knew you didn't fit in with them. There were 2 anthros and 1 other human. A female, brown, bear named Maya, a male, golden, lion named Cody and a thin, tall, human, boy named Heath. Your year level was at an excursion to Farringdon Mansion, where The Duke Sebastian Farringdon lives and works.

Your friends were joking about as usual and were doing impressions of teachers and other students in your school, they were all taking in turns doing impressions. Maya just finished her impression of the history teacher by fake falling to sleep when they all started to look down at you.

"What?" You asked confused.

"Your turn." Heath said. You look at him puzzled.

"Uh... I don't know what to do..." You say shrugging. They start to think, then Cody spots something behind you, you didn't look. You should have. They looked too and nodded grinning evilly.

"Be... The Duke." Maya said. You shrug and start your act, you do things that would mock The Duke, as your friends did with the teachers and other students. They all start laughing and you smile, for once. They thought you were funny, but that wasn't what they were laughing at, because little did you know there were four people watching you. And the fourth was not happy. You finally stop to someone clearing their throat, you turn around and have to look up to see who was glaring down at you. Your eyes widen to see the 7 foot tall Duke, and boy was he pissed! He was HUGE compared to your small 5 foot tall frame. He started to speak.

"Excuse me young man, what was that?" He asks in a posh, serious tone, his fox muzzle scrunching up. You laugh half heartily and scratch the back of his head. Your "friends" were almost pissing themselves in the background at the scene before them, you growl at them and turn your head back at The Duke.

"Uh... well it was a game... to see... uh... you could do... the... worst? Impression of people... Like TOTALLY different from who they really are..." You say sheepishly.

"Oh..." The Duke says smiling a fake smile. "That makes much more sense now." Your eyes widen 'That actually worked?' You thought to yourself in surprise.

"Mansion now!" The Duke says in an angered tone as the roughly points to the mansion. You frown and hang your head and stare at the grass. 'I'll be borrowing one of your students and will be bringing him home personally!" The Duke shouts to one of your teachers. They nod and smile.

You sulk the whole way through the corridors and rooms until you get to one fancy door. The Duke pushes the door open to reveal a beautiful room. It had red carpet and leather chairs surrounding a fire. he lead you inside, locks the door and stands near the fire. You follow close behind.

"You know mocking me is a serious crime." he says looking at only the fire and then quickly turns around to you.

"Yes..." You say.

"I have enough money to bankrupt your family easily you know." He says as your eyes widen.

"NO!" You shout he glares at you, "Sorry..."

"But I won't, your family doesn't deserve punishment. YOU DO!" He grabs a chain and clips some kind of metal collar around your neck.

"KNEEL!" he shouts at you. You nod quickly, he held the chain strongly and smiled evilly. "A lot of people tend to dislike my 'punishment'." You shiver, not knowing what he is going to do. He sits down on a leather chair and reaches for his boot. You raise an eyebrow at this and he smiles, but as soon as he took the boot off a horrendous smell hits you. It was musky and cheesy and it obviously came from his feet. His red socks were stained with marks and his boots were steaming.

"Time for you to see how I got my 'Rank'." he says smiling. He pulls the chain and you move closer to his feet.

"NO!" You scream but it was too late, the tall fox had already shoved his foot in your face. You cough and retch and the smell covering your nose. "Take it off1 take it off!" You shout.

"What? My sock?" he smiles.
